Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed,'' Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter feed after the announcement. Now, Eric Schmidt said he will focus on deals, business relationships and working with governments, and still act as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin . Strong results The move comes as Google posted a 29% jump in profit and revenue for the fourth quarter. Net income was? 2.54 billion, while revenue was? 8.4 billion.
